name: A. Counting Orders
statement:
You are given two arrays a and b each consisting of n integers. All
elements of a are pairwise distinct.Find the number of ways to reorder a
such that a_i > b_i for all 1
le i
le n, modulo 10^9 + 7.Two ways of reordering are considered different if
the resulting arrays are different.
